attributes.action: Make hit and runs on cats a criminal offence
attributes.additional_details: I would like to see the law changed so collisions with cats have to be reported to the police and owners notified by scanning of the microchip.
attributes.background: We all see so many Facebook posts and hear so many stories of people’s cats getting killed or left for dead at the side of the road with no one reporting anything and for the owners these pets are a part of the family, very much loved and it’s devastating to loose them.
